description: Organize and facilitate the project kick-off meeting to align all stakeholders on project objectives, timelines, and roles.
Establish the necessary development and testing environments for the project, including cloud resources and local setups.
Define and document the communication protocols to be used during the project, detailing how information will be shared among stakeholders.
Create wireframes and user interface designs for the front-end application, ensuring adherence to accessibility standards.
Setup the Angular framework for the front-end application, including initial configurations and project structure.
Develop foundational UI components for the application using Angular that will be reused throughout the project.
Establish the structure for the ASP.NET Core backend project, including folder organization and initial configurations.
Develop RESTful APIs to support the core functionalities of the ERP application, ensuring proper endpoint structures.
Design the database schema using MongoDB that supports the data requirements of the ERP system.
Implement AI features for predictive analytics within the ERP system to enhance data-driven decision making.
Integrate APIs for core modules such as finance, HR, and supply chain to ensure seamless data flow across the application.
Implement user authentication processes and access controls to secure the ERP system.
Conduct thorough functional testing of the ERP application to ensure all features meet the defined specifications.
Facilitate user acceptance testing sessions with end users to gather feedback and confirm that the application meets their needs.
Make necessary adjustments to the application based on feedback received during user acceptance testing.
Deploy the completed ERP application on the Azure cloud platform, ensuring security and scalability.
Provide user training sessions to educate end-users on how to effectively use the new ERP system.
Monitor the performance of the ERP application post-launch to ensure it meets performance and uptime KPIs.
Form a risk management team tasked with monitoring and addressing potential risks throughout the project lifecycle.
Develop and implement a change management strategy to handle transitional challenges during the project's execution.
Set up CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps for automated testing and deployment processes.
Implement containerization for the application using Docker to ensure consistency across development and production environments.
Establish role-based access control mechanisms to secure the application and manage user permissions.
Embed data encryption practices for both data in transit and at rest to ensure compliance with security standards.
Set up the version control repository for the Online Quiz App project. Ensure that the repository structure is aligned with best practices and that initial documentation is included.
Create detailed project structure documentation outlining components, architecture, and workflows. This document should serve as a reference for the development team.
Develop wireframes for the Online Quiz App focusing on user journey, accessibility, and intuitive navigation. Present wireframes for feedback from stakeholders.
Create user journey diagrams to map out the experience of a user interacting with the Online Quiz App. These diagrams must align with the intended features.
Initialize the backend server environment using Node.js and Express. Ensure that the server is configured for development and future deployment.
Develop the RESTful APIs required for the Quiz application. Ensure endpoints are documented and adhere to RESTful principles.
Design the database schema using PostgreSQL to support user management, quiz creation, and analytics features. The schema design must ensure data integrity and security.
Implement the core functionality of the frontend using Vue.js, ensuring that the application is responsive and user-friendly.
Develop navigation features for the Online Quiz App to enhance user experience and engagement across different quiz sections.
Implement support for various quiz types within the application, ensuring that users can engage in multiple formats of quizzes.
Organize and conduct user testing sessions to gather feedback on usability and functionality. Document findings and prepare recommendations for improvements.
Deploy the Online Quiz App on Google Cloud Platform, ensuring that the environment is configured for security and performance according to the project requirements.
Conduct regular integration testing between frontend and backend components to mitigate integration challenges. Document results and address issues promptly.
Schedule and lead daily stand-up meetings for the project team to discuss progress, challenges, and upcoming tasks. Ensure clear communication is maintained.
Implement a continuous testing approach, including unit and integration tests, ensuring thorough testing of all application components throughout the development lifecycle.
Conduct monthly reviews of the project budget, analyzing spending against the initial budget projections, and document any necessary adjustments.

summary: Change Control: Version Control Policy Definition
description: Define a formal version control policy using Git, outlining branching strategies and merging protocols for effective collaboration among team members.

summary: Feedback Collection: Initial User Feedback Survey
description: Develop and distribute an initial user feedback survey post-launch to gather insights on user experience and satisfaction. Analyze results for future improvements.
Initiate project planning and conduct project kick-off meeting with stakeholders. Establish governance and schedule initial project milestones.
Ongoing project management to oversee the progress of project activities for a duration of 6 months, ensuring timely delivery and stakeholder alignment.
Set up the development environment and necessary tooling for the project's infrastructure and development workflows.
Develop and deploy the log collector service for AWS to ingest logs efficiently for processing.
Develop and deploy the log collector service for Azure to ensure multi-cloud log ingestion.
Set up the Kafka cluster using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) to manage scalability and reliability.
Develop a microservice for processing ingested logs and performing necessary transformations.
Create and polish feature engineering processes to enhance model training data for analytics.

summary: ML Model Development - Model Training & Tuning
description: Train and tune the machine learning model to ensure it meets accuracy requirements as specified.

summary: ML Model Serving with TensorFlow Serving
description: Deploy the trained ML model using TensorFlow Serving to enable predictions through the backend API.
Develop a RESTful API using Flask to provide access to processed log data and ML predictions.
Create a responsive dashboard using React and D3 to visualize log and anomaly detection insights.
Integrate security practices including OAuth 2.0 authentication and data encryption protocols.
Establish Continuous Integration and Continuous Deployment pipelines using Jenkins for automating builds and deployments.
Conduct comprehensive testing and validation of all developed components to ensure functionality and reliability.
Produce user manuals and training materials to meet documentation requirements for the platform.
Prepare for the deployment of the platform, overseeing final validation and launch activities.
Conclude project activities, perform handover sessions with stakeholders, and document lessons learned.
